  StepWait
  <span data-algolia-exclude><span class="pill pill--object pill--normal-case pill--large"><code>OBJECT</code></span></span>
</h1>
<!-- vale on -->


A wait step waits for all previous steps to have successfully completed before allowing following jobs to continue
